name: European Balloon & Party Council
goal: Our mission is to create a positive and sustainable environment to grow the industry. We work to help with improving industry standards, education, sustainability, and provide a provide a collective voice for the industry.
interests: Agriculture, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
We have been involved in public consultations but was not eligible to participate in the SUP and Plastic Strategy. The industry was excluded since different materials were classified as one item.

We aim to participate in the Single Use Plastics proposed directive between the European Commission, ENVI and the European Parliament.
